mapper.select: select ID as id,t.BUSINESSS_TYPE as businessType ,t.BUSINESSS_NAME as businessName , t.GOOD_TYPE as goodType , t.LINK_TYPE as linkType , t.LINK_NAME as linkName , t.DIC_TYPE as dicType , t.DIC_NAME as dicName , t.WARNING as warning, t.EDN_FLAG as endFlag, t.DIC_NUM as dicNum from WARNING_LINK_RULE t
